resultsDocumentation.description: Students achieving offers from at least one of their first choice schools, including Eton, St Paul's, Westminster, Highgate, Queen Elizabeth's, NLCS, Henrietta Barnett, Wilson's and more.
Our GCSE students consistently improve by two or more full levels during their time with us.
resultsDocumentation.timeframe: Long-term tracking across multiple academic years

resultsDocumentation.description: From 7+ entrance all the way through to A Levels, our tutees frequently score in the top 2% of candidates. For example, one of our current students obtained the highest GCSE Science score in all of Asia.

caseStudies.anonymizedTitle: Cambridge Mathematics Offer - London Independent School
caseStudies.subject: Mathematics
caseStudies.initialPosition: Predicted B in A-Level Mathematics, uncertain about university applications
caseStudies.finalOutcome: A* achieved in Mathematics, conditional offer from Cambridge (Trinity College)
keyInterventions: STEP exam preparation with former Cambridge examiner
University application guidance and interview coaching
Mock interview sessions with current Cambridge academics
caseStudies.clientTestimonial: Elizabeth's network provided access to genuine Cambridge expertise. The STEP preparation was transformational, and the interview coaching gave confidence that made all the difference. Worth every investment.

caseStudies.anonymizedTitle: Competitive Grammar School Success - Surrey Family
caseStudies.subject: 11+ Comprehensive
caseStudies.initialPosition: Average performance in practice tests, anxious about exam technique
caseStudies.finalOutcome: Offers from 3 out of 3 target grammar schools, scored in top 5% of candidates
keyInterventions: English comprehension and creative writing development
Exam confidence and time management training
Regular progress assessments and strategy adjustments
caseStudies.clientTestimonial: The structured approach eliminated our anxiety. Our child went from dreading practice tests to approaching exams with genuine confidence. All three grammar school offers exceeded our expectations.

caseStudies.anonymizedTitle: Ultra-High Net Worth Family - International School Success
caseStudies.subject: Multiple subjects
caseStudies.initialPosition: Relocating internationally, needed seamless educational continuity
caseStudies.finalOutcome: IB score of 43/45, Ivy League acceptances to 4 target universities
keyInterventions: Global tutoring coordination across multiple time zones
Subject-specific experts for all IB disciplines
US university application strategy and essay development
Complete discretion protocols for high-profile family
caseStudies.clientTestimonial: The level of discretion and expertise was exactly what our family required. Elizabeth personally managed every detail, allowing us to focus on our business while ensuring our child's educational excellence.

caseStudies.subject: Mathematics and Sciences
caseStudies.initialPosition: Researched multiple tutoring companies, needed proven ROI justification
caseStudies.finalOutcome: All target grades achieved (8s and 9s), clear path to competitive A-Levels
keyInterventions: Detailed progress tracking with quantified metrics
Regular ROI assessments and strategy optimisation
Clear milestone achievements with measurable outcomes
caseStudies.clientTestimonial: We evaluated six tutoring services. Elizabeth's approach provided the clearest value proposition with tangible results at every stage. The investment delivered exactly the outcomes we needed.
